attributes.additional_details:
Last Labour government originally wanted to introduced British National Day into reality but in 2008 they ditched the idea.

We are the country with no official national day or british dream although we do have a dream.

I urge the government to bring the British dream into reality.

I have a dream that one day this nation will have British national day.

The British dream can be different than American Dream, Chinese Dream or European Dream.
